      • getLocation

        public static void getLocation(android.content.Context context,
                               org.apache.cordova.CallbackContext callbackContext,
                               android.os.HandlerThread handlerThread,
                               com.dff.cordova.plugin.common.service.ServiceHandler serviceHandler,
                               org.json.JSONArray args)
        Get the last good location from the service if it's available. Good location means in this context: accuracy < 20m.
        Parameters:
        context - - The context of the application.
        callbackContext - - The callback context used when calling back into JavaScript.
        handlerThread - - The used handle thread
        serviceHandler - - The used service handler.
        args - - The exec() arguments.

      • getLocationList

        public static void getLocationList(org.apache.cordova.CallbackContext callbackContext)
        Get the all pending location that are stored in the location list. These location has been stored to be sent back later.
        Parameters:
        callbackContext - - The callback context used when calling back into JavaScript.
